entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
